# Execution Rhythm Checklist

Use this checklist weekly for consistent evidence quality across projects.

## Weekly Planning

- [ ] Pick 1-3 outcomes for the week.
- [ ] Open/refresh issues for each outcome.
- [ ] Define measurable success criteria for each issue.

## During Implementation

- [ ] Keep PR scope reviewable in under 20 minutes.
- [ ] Record non-trivial decisions as ADRs.
- [ ] Capture screenshots/GIFs for user-visible changes.

## Before Merge

- [ ] Lint/test/build pass.
- [ ] PR template fully completed.
- [ ] Risk and rollback steps documented.

## After Merge

- [ ] Update `CHANGELOG.md`.
- [ ] Log demo artifact in `docs/demos/`.
- [ ] Update weekly metrics snapshot.

## End of Week

- [ ] Publish one concise weekly summary.
- [ ] Note what worked, what did not, and why.
- [ ] Define next week's top 1-3 priorities.
